EmailTemplate.subject: ForeFlight Now Available in Honeywell Forge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
At Honeywell, our mission is to continuously innovate and improve our customer’s experience. One way to deliver the best experience is by partnering with aviation’s best-in-class service providers. Today we are thrilled to announce that ForeFlight Dispatch will be accessible via Honeywell Forge <[[https://www.aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/connected-aircraft/business-aviation/airtime-services]]>, a robust suite of comprehensive business aviation services.
What is ForeFlight Dispatch? ForeFlight Dispatch <[[https://foreflight.com/products/dispatch/]]> is a powerful flight planning software that delivers reliable, easy and real-time flight planning for business jets. By incorporating ForeFlight Dispatch with Honeywell Forge, your flight department will benefit from greater control over your fleet operations with a singular solution for all their planning, tracking, datalink, and operational needs. CLICK HERE <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=58&v=-BsFTJpYti0&feature=emb_logo]]> to watch a short video on the new software.
How Can I Start Using ForeFlight? Easy. Simply contact our team here to enable the capability or get an updated quote for the ForeFlight subscription.
What Does This Mean for Honeywell’s Flight Planning Service? Our promise is a best-in-class experience with Honeywell Forge. It’s our #1 priority. This integration simply gives our customers more options to better fit their needs. We will continue to support and provide flight planning from Honeywell as a service. In the coming months, your Honeywell sales representative will reach out to you personally to talk about your options and answer any questions about the partnership.
Need Help or Have Questions? Our Team is Here to Answer Your Questions, 24/7. Our 24/7 operations team is available to help at any time to answer questions about this new option.
Want to learn more about ForeFlight and Honeywell Forge? Click below to learn more.
LEARN MORE <[[https://bga.honeywellforge.com/ff]]>
